document_data.caption: The vast expanse of the Plains of Purple Dust.
document_data.name: Plains of Purple Dust
document_data.mainbody: The '''Plains of Purple Dust''' was a vast windy desert located east of the [[Dragonsword Mountains]] on the edge of the region occupied by [[Mulhorand]] and the northern region of the [[Raurin]] desert. The desert expanded in the century following the [[Spellplague]] of [[1385 DR]].
document_data.Geographic Features: The Plains of Purple Dust was covered with a purple-colored dust that radiated faint [[magic]] and stony crags and rocky badlands.
document_data.Inhabitants:
* [[Purple worm]]s
* Sludar: A nomadic tribe of [[mongrelmen]].
* [[Human]] nomads
* [[Lizardfolk]] could be found in the [[Underdark]] beneath the dust cities.
* [[Brown dragon]]s, [[blue dragon]]s, and [[brass dragon]]s could be found here.
* [[Spectral mage]]s, the [[undead]] remains of [[Imaskari]] artificers.
* [[Roc]]s were rumored to nest in the mountains.
* Purple [[sandling]]s inhabited the dunes.
document_data.Oases:
* The [[Grinning Skull]]: A large pool shielded by the skull of a great [[wyrm]] [[dragon]].
* The [[Lonely Lake]]: The descendants of the wizard [[Nezram]] could be often found here
document_data.Ruins: Dozens of ancient arcane towers made of purple stone could be found here.
